item.title: Alberta Median Income Using R
item.description: I ran across this article on the CBC website “Albertans still make the most money, but other provinces are catching up” and it has the following chart: The size of the difference between Alberta and the other Canadian provinces surprises me, but it cites the relevant StatsCan Table so I should be able to reproduce this. Sounds like a nice challenge for my nascent R skills. I’m a complete beginner with R, so none of the following should be interpreted as best practice.
